  1. """Variable filters for the ``payslip```application."""
  2. from django.template.base import Library
  3. from django.utils.safestring import mark_safe
  5. from payslip.models import ExtraField
  7. register = Library()
  10. @register.filter(is_safe=True)
  11. def get_extra_field_value(field_type, payment):
  12. """Returns the value of a specific field type."""
  13. try:
  14. return payment.extra_fields.get(field_type=field_type).value
  15. except ExtraField.DoesNotExist:
  16. return mark_safe('&nbsp;')
